segments.text: I see this cozy kitchen with sunlight streaming in from the window.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a woman drying a plate, looking so focused on it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's wearing an apron, just like my mom used to.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But oh no, the sink is overflowing right behind her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring out onto the floor, making a big puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She hasn't noticed yet; her foot is already in it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Over on the left, there's a boy climbing on a stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching into the cookie jar in the cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks wobbly, like it might tip any second.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And his sister is standing there, holding out her hand for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're being so sneaky, hoping mom doesn't turn around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks peaceful, what a contrast.
segments.speaker: PAR
